entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature "Sync-File-Names" #61973
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61971
  • Null check inside a loop affects CS8602 for unrelated code in the same method #61964
    17.3
  • CS8866 is reported for properties in nested records with the same name as their enclosing type instead of CS0542 #61961
    Backlog
  • Mismatch between CSDiagnostic line number in message and location #61960
    17.3
  • CompletionProvider descriptions not working #61950
    Backlog
  • [Hot Reload] Roslyn stops reporting edits in VS session due to debugger crash #61949
  • StringSyntax doesn't work on an attribute property assignment #61947

Closed

  • Unhelpful CS0119 error when unable to find a static abstract method to resolve #61486
    C# 11.0
  • C# interactive has problems with `switch` expression with `var` #59290
    Compiler.Next
  • Confirm whether we would like to support use of static abstract methods declared in interfaces as operators in query expressions #53796
    C# 11.0
  • Intermittent test TestGetCodeFixWithExceptionInFixableDiagnosticIds2 #21533
    Backlog
  • Contract violation in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Tagging.AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider`1.TagSource.Finalize() during test run #21708
    Backlog
  • Symbol of closed Generic Attribute does not fill `TypeArguments` with correct symbols #61490
    17.3
  • Can't debug source generator using roslyn component if total dependency file path lengths is too big #55802
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix logic issue in find-refs that could fail to find related symbols in inheritance #61972
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reported accessibility issues with StackTrace Explorer #61970
    Area-IDE
  • Do not add cast to object when converting string.Format to interpolated string #61969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Read editorconfig options from the editor in GetInferredFormattingOptions #61968
    Area-IDE
  • Use native azdo command for checkout #61965
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support virtual conversion and equality operators #61963
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Fix race condition in FixAll tests based off TrackNodes functionality #61958
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add all references when finding symbols in implementation assemblies #61953
    Area-IDE
  • Support embedded languages on named attribute arguments #61951
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • SerializableOptionSet and IOptionService cleanup #61839
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve error message for lookup on a type parameter. #61967
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Use 'Clear' to empty a CWT when on .net core #61952
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61966
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for additional file diagnostics in workspace pull #61930
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Don't use exceptions for flow control #61948
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61945
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61937
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61946
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • NRT enable symbolfinder/find-refs code. #61921
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid accessing Document from formatter services #61928
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Convert connection lost exceptions to cancellations to avoid overreporting NFE #61792
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not report populate switch diagnostic when switch type is unknown #61809
    Area-IDE, Community
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter symbol first before creating InheritanceMargin target #61911
    Area-IDE
  • Do not show name suggestions after event name #61807
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
